titles.title: Enhancing Southbound Inspections to Combat Cartels Act
Enhancing Southbound Inspections to Combat Cartels Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to enhance capabilities for outbound inspections at the southern land border, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
